body.name: KOCH SYSTEME CS CSK 11+12in Nonstick Frying Pan Sets With Glass Lids-Cookware Sets With Stone-Derived Ultra Nonstick Coating,100% PFOA&APEO Free,Induction Available Frying Skillets,Wok Pans,4PC,Black

byLineInfo.name: Visit the KOCH SYSTEME CS Store

Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 28 mins
features: [Ultra Nonstick Frying Pan with Lid] - With Titanium interior is scratch-resistant that enhances both durability and usage experience. Everything will just slides right off the truly nonstick surface for optimum cooking. Food-grade quality multilayer bottom which ensures rapid and even heat conduction.

[Heat Mastery Frying Pan System] - These 2 pans in the set (11" + 12") are made of forged aluminum alloy that conducts heat quickly and evenly with precise temperature control. The 3 mm-thick body makes this pan durable and anti-warping. Provided with the heat conduction base technology, the food will be heat quickly.

[Ceramic Coating & Less Oil] - KOCH SYSTEME CS nonstick frying pan utilizes German-designed stone-derived coating, which is free of PTFE and PFOA. Unlike traditional skillets, it allows you to cook with less oil or butter. Ideals for over low to medium heat with less oil or butter for healthy diet.

[Outstanding Quality & Easy to clean] - The frying pans set is anti-warping and scratch-resistant that enhances both durability and usage experience. Whether it's an egg, steak, or muffin, it's easy to clean and you can say goodbye to the annoying burning food which sticking to the pans.
[Ergonomic Comfortable Handles] - The bakelite handle of this stir-fry pan with ergonomic design, which allows you to easily grip and maneuver the pan when cooking.
body.description: WHITFORD NONSTICK COATING CSK 11''+12'' cookware sets are stone-derived coated which can achieve perfect non-stick, and are completely PFOA and APEO free. The coating is non-toxic and allows you to cook with less oil or butter. They are super easy to clean with the nonstick surface. CSK adopts the uniform heating Tec. The bottom of Nonstick Frying Pan is made up of three layers. The radial heat conduction points arranged in the outermost layer help to avoid uneven heat conduction. The metal material and thickness of the middle layer fully absorb heat, while the inner layer is made of brushed aluminum alloy to balance the heat absorption, so that the bottom of these cookware pan sets can be evenly and quickly heated

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CSK 11''+12'' Cookware Sets KOCH SYSTEME CS BRAND STORY Find your best nonstick skillets and frying pans from KOCH SYSTEME CS KOCH SYSTEME CS, since the 1980s, is a kitchenware brand of Carl Schmidt Sohn GmbH, in Solingen, Germany. Building on our expertise, since 1829, in the development of knives and cutlery, KOCH SYSTEME CS has been expanding into further kitchenware product categories with focus on flatware and cookware concepts that perfectly meet the needs of our customers. KOCH SYSTEME CS core product lines are characterized by fexibility and individuality. The brand KOCH SYSTEME CS is available in many different parts of the world and distributed worldwide through our international branch of offices in Los Angeles and in Hong Kong. Due to the international representations as well as the experience and expertise in kitchenware, KOCH SYSTEME CS can meet the needs of its business partners.

WHITFORD NONSTICK COATING CSK 11''+12'' cookware sets are stone-derived coated which can achieve perfect non-stick, and are completely PFOA and APEO free. The coating is non-toxic and allows you to cook with less oil or butter. They are super easy to clean with the nonstick surface. CSK adopts the uniform heating Tec. The bottom of Nonstick Frying Pan is made up of three layers. The radial heat conduction points arranged in the outermost layer help to avoid uneven heat conduction. The metal material and thickness of the middle layer fully absorb heat, while the inner layer is made of brushed aluminum alloy to balance the heat absorption, so that the bottom of these cookware pan sets can be evenly and quickly heated 11'' + 12'' skillets nonstick with lids Conducts heat quickly and distributes heat evenly Easy to clean and easy to maintain Suitable for serving three to five people

Even Heating & Induction Bottom CSK Frying Pan Sets adopted the unique design for oven & all stovetops. The three-tier bottom achieves a perfect balance in weight, shape, and material, compatible with all stovetops include the induction stove. The radiation arrangement of heat-conduct points on the outermost layer ensures the uniform heat conduction of the bottom of this skillet sets, while the height and lines of the outer ring enhance the applicability of these Nonstick Frying Pans, which in line with the working principle of all stovetops. And these pans are not too heavy but not too light either. Comfortable Grip The handles of the frying pans are comfortable to grip and ergonomic. The 11”+12” frying pan sets are optimal for day to day cooking. The stainless steel handle is able to resist high-temperature cooking, ideal for perfect searing fillets. However, please note that direct flame heating won't damage the handles but may cause burns. Please avoid leaving the handles on an open flame for a long time Tempered Glass Lid Both nonstick frying pans come with tempered glass lids. The glass lids will prevent splashing of water/oil during cooking to prevent burns and helps keep your countertop clean. Most importantly, cover your skillets then heat more evenly, and transparent design can also make it easy to check the progress of cooking and lock in all the flavors of your food. Nonstick Interior for Easy Cleaning The surface of the frying pan is a German non-stick coating for perfect non-stick performance, which is 100% non-toxic. The CSK Nonstick Frying Pans are completely PFOA and APEO free. The coating allows you to cook with less oil or butter and makes cleaning easier. For a longer lifespan, it’s recommended to hand wash the cookware (not dishwasher safe). Even Heating Stay-Cool Handles Vented Glass Lids Nonstick Coating

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these pans!
reviews.reviewText: Can't beat these pans at such a great price! I love mine so much that I gave a set to my daughter for Christmas! Cooks nice and evenly, easy clean-up, sturdy...highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The non-stick performs perfectly, it heats up evenly and the lid is easy to put on and seals very nicely. Not too sure what else to say... so far it is showing great durability with no scratches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice skillet
reviews.reviewText: This skillet seems to be everything it was advertised to be. It is well made, cleans easily, and heats evenly. I have used it only a few times, so I cannot attest to how long the non stick coating will last. If there is a problem, I will update this review. For now, I am quite happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality set.
reviews.reviewText: Large and heavy duty. Looks like something a professional would use. I returned them before I used them because it was more than I wanted, but just looking at them I coud tell they were very high quality. I couldn't rate the features because I never used it but I would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean but lightweight - which raises questions of durability.
reviews.reviewText: The pans look nice and the nonstick is very good. I can cook an egg without any oil and it doesn't stick. The handles are a bit wide but comfortable. One of the lids doesn't fit well (almost like it's a bit oval and I have to squeeze it in there to get it to fit. The pan are much lighter than comparable ones, which along with the poor fitting lid makes me wonder about long term quality and durability. I read the "Lifetime Warranty" and like other similar items, it seems pretty useless. Its warranty on manufacturer defects which means if the nonstick starts to peel in a few months it will likely not be covered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The best fry pan I have owned. So easy to clean. I love this pan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality low price!
reviews.reviewText: Quality is on par with my much more expensive ones. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow these are great
reviews.reviewText: I love this wok and skillet set. Not had anything stick to them. Love the pattern of the finish and also the wife has the same wok but in grey. We both cherish them greatly. Gifted to each other and have used them none stop.They do anything you want them too.HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product to you and if thinking of getting a Wok this is a great one
The only issue I have is the screw was loose on the lid of the smaller pan which is minor. Great pans, easy clean up and light enough to handle with my arthritic hands.

reviews.reviewTitle: Large wok! Good wok! Can’t find a place to store wok!
reviews.reviewText: Can easily cook a large batch of food with this wok. It is nonstick and easy-clean but it’s been difficult to find a suitable worthy storage space for this beast of a wok. I recommend using wooden or nylon ustensiles (such as a pair of long wooden cooking/hotpot chopsticks) when cooking in this wok to protect the nonstick coating.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ok, just ok. Not bad, just ok.
reviews.reviewText: Ok - it turns out that wide wok’s (14 inch) are limited in selection. Bought this one based on the reviews. Upfront - we are pot snobs. Whatever they blah blah about complex metal layers - this is an aluminum pot. Aluminum is a great heat transfer metal but you can get hot spots. We haven’t had that issue but we also haven’t used it on super high heat. The no stick works well but they also instruct you not to get it too hot..but ...well you use a wok quite often....er...umm....hot. So that’s bad.This pot is ok. Not great. But also not $400 either. So overall it works for us but no copper bottom French sauce pan. Might be cottage pot.One other thing - the crappy thin metal handle gets crazy hot! Watch out! 2 stars otherwise 3 stars.
